tool_description:
Gain access to 30 day AI/ML powered stock forecasts that are based on our proprietary machine learning and neural networks model. Our stock symbol database includes roughly 200,000 stock symbols (largest stock database on RapidAPI) spanning 92 of the most well known global stock exchanges in the world. Each forecast day also includes a BUY, HOLD and SELL trading signal that is based on our cutting edge proprietary trading signal machine learning algorithm. 

Our proprietary model is based on ...
name: Forecastica
title: Forecastica

api_list.name: Get Stock Forecast API
api_list.description:
The Forecastica stock forecasts API utilizes AI and our proprietary machine learning and neural network algorithm to generate 30 day stock forecasts for roughly 200,000 stock symbols that belong to 92 of the most well-known exchanges in the world that span the United States (around 15,000 symbols in total for NYSE, NASDAQ), Europe and Asia.  Each forecast includes open, close, low and high stock prices.   In addition, each forecast include a fap value which is the moving average of the forecasted open, close, low and high price.  The fapPct is a percentage value that represents a predicted percentage change that shows the stock price movement in the predicted stock price calculated based on the forecasted stock price from a given day as compared to the next day stock price forecast ( (day 1 stock price forecast - day 2 stock forecast ) / day 1 stock price forecast).  In addition, each forecasting day includes a BUY, HOLD and SELL trading signal that is based on our proprietary machine learning trading algorithm.  Our trading signal is based on mathematically predicted turning points (relative minimum or maximum value of stock quotes vs. time)

Our proprietary AI/ML model is based on machine learning and neural networks. Simply put, our stock forecasts are driven by pattern recognition that enables the model to identify stock-purchasing trends. It then provides an objective recommendation on what action to take with any given stock!

Our software will help you to hear the pulse of the stock market and get recommendations for the best BUY/SELL/HOLD moments!

The currency for stock price forecasts are in the local currency of the given exchange specifically the FOREX currency code for the exchange returned in the /api/exchanges endpoint.

If you get zero results for the given stock symbol use the /exchanges/{EXCHANGE-SYMBOL}/stocks API to lookup the symbol for the given exchange because the symbol may have changed over time as a result you will need query through some of the stock symbols for the given company and try each of their symbols to find out which one is the current stock symbol and data will be returned for the current stock symbol.

required_parameters.name: SYMBOL_NAME-EXCHANGE_SYMBOL
required_parameters.description: Consists of two parts: {SYMBOLNAME}-{EXCHANGE_SYMBOL}, then you can use, for example, MSFT.O-NASDAQ

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://forecastica.p.rapidapi.com/api/forecasts/MSFT.O-NASDAQ"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "forecastica.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://forecastica.p.rapidapi.com/api/forecasts/{symbol_name_exchange_symbol}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "forecastica.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Historical Stock Prices API
api_list.description:
The Forecastica historical stock price API provides 5 years of historical end of day data for roughly 200,000 stock symbols that belong to 92 of the most well-known exchanges in the world and that span the United States (around 15,000 symbols in total for NYSE, NASDAQ), Europe and Asia. Each end of day stock price includes the open, close, low and high stock prices.   

Use the ticker code to get the data for any company. For example, MSFT.O-NASDAQ consists of two parts separated by a dash: {SYMBOL_NAME}-{EXCHANGE_SYMBOL}

To and From date must be in the following format YYYY-MM-DD

The currency for history data are in the local currency of the given exchange specifically the FOREX currency code for the exchange returned in the /api/exchanges endpoint

IIf you get zero results for the given stock symbol use the /exchanges/{EXCHANGE-SYMBOL}/stocks API to lookup the symbol for the given exchange because the symbol may have changed over time as a result you will need query through some of the stock symbols for the given company and try each of their symbols to find out which one is the current stock symbol and data will be returned for the current stock symbol.

required_parameters.name: SYMBOL_NAME-EXCHANGE_SYMBOL
required_parameters.description: Consists of two parts: {SYMBOLNAME}-{EXCHANGE_SYMBOL}, then you can use, for example, MSFT.O-NASDAQ

api_list.name: Get List of Exchanges API
api_list.description:
Forecastica APIs cover roughly 200,000 stock symbols which include 92 of the most well-known exchanges in the world spanning the United States (around 15,000 symbols in total for NYSE, NASDAQ), Europe and Asia.  This endpoint will return a list of exchanges and its corresponding market symbol code need for stock forecast and stock history API endpoint and  the currency code for the exchange.  The stock forecast and stock history endpoint return pricing data based on the currency of the stock exchange.

 Our data spans the globe, so whatever region you prefer to trade—from North America to Europe to Asia, we have it. See our website for full list of exchanges http://www.forecastica.com/exchanges.html
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://forecastica.p.rapidapi.com/api/exchanges"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "forecastica.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Stock Symbols By Exchange API
api_list.description: The Forecastica APIs cover roughly 200,000 stock symbols which include 92 of the most well-known exchanges in the world that span the United States (around 15,000 symbols in total for NYSE, NASDAQ), Europe and Asia. This endpoint will return a valid list of stock symbols for the given stock exchange that can be leveraged for stock forecast and historical stock prices endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://forecastica.p.rapidapi.com/api/exchanges/NASDAQ/stocks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "forecastica.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://forecastica.p.rapidapi.com/api/exchanges/{exchange_symbol}/stocks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "forecastica.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
